commit.message:
Rollup merge of #82175 - RalfJung:invalid-fn-ptr, r=oli-obk

validation: fix invalid-fn-ptr error message

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/82061 changed the code here to print an `ImmTy` instead of a `ScalarMaybeUninit`; that was an accident. So go back to printing a `ScalarMaybeUninit`.

r? ```@oli-obk```

verification.payload:
tree a0af02dca47a6fcb26edd8a1e019ebaf512d1b63
parent 46b93b2e44405a3d914eb07dfe33bc39226bfe71
parent e5514efab25a4cefac730d6fb6d7917a4cf1cbb6
author Guillaume Gomez <guillaume1.gomez@gmail.com> 1613499681 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1613499681 +0100

Rollup merge of #82175 - RalfJung:invalid-fn-ptr, r=oli-obk

validation: fix invalid-fn-ptr error message

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/82061 changed the code here to print an `ImmTy` instead of a `ScalarMaybeUninit`; that was an accident. So go back to printing a `ScalarMaybeUninit`.

r? ```@oli-obk```

files.patch:
@@ -1,75 +1,91 @@
 error[E0080]: it is undefined behavior to use this value
-  --> $DIR/ub-ref.rs:6:1
+  --> $DIR/ub-ref-ptr.rs:12:1
    |
 LL | const UNALIGNED: &u16 = unsafe { mem::transmute(&[0u8; 4]) };
    | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ type validation failed: encountered an unaligned reference (required 2 byte alignment but found 1)
    |
    = note: The rules on what exactly is undefined behavior aren't clear, so this check might be overzealous. Please open an issue on the rustc repository if you believe it should not be considered undefined behavior.
